Jazzwaltz

3/4 time for jazz pieces like "Bluesette".

JazzWaltz

Basic jazz waltz. (4)
Bass AcousticBass
Chord Piano1
Chord-Guitar JazzGuitar
Drum-Cym RideCymbal1
Drum-Hh ClosedHiHat
Drum-Snare SnareDrum1
Walk AcousticBass
